alert.note: Alert for Clay; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:24PM CDT until June 29 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland County in southeastern Illinois... Southeastern Clay County in south central Illinois... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clay City, or 8 miles northeast of Flora, moving east-southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Noble and Schnell around 635 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Olney, Parkersburg, Calhoun and Claremont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
